mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stockRequest (type, itemCode, itemName, basicQuantity, drawingNo, detailDrawingNo, location, requesterId, requesterDept, note, requesterName, groupId) VALUES(#{type}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{basicQuantity}, #{drawingNo}, #{detailDrawingNo}, #{location}, #{requesterId}, #{requesterDept}, #{note}, #{requesterName}, #{groupId});

INSERT INTO locationModiRequest (itemId, itemCode, modiLocation, location, requesterId, requesterName, requesterDept, drawingNo, type, itemName, groupId, note, quantity, modiQuantity) VALUES(#{itemId}, #{itemCode}, #{modiLocation}, #{location}, #{requesterId}, #{requesterName}, #{requesterDept}, #{drawingNo}, #{type}, #{itemName}, #{groupId}, #{note}, #{quantity}, #{modiQuantity});
